name: Acadiana CCTV
description: Supplier of CCTV and security cameras-LA
overview: Acadiana CCTV offers a complete line of quality CCTV cameras and security cameras for surveillance systems. We are not only a distributor of surveillance equipment but we also test and support each product that we sell.Our company is based out of Lafayette, Louisiana and has 22 years of IT and consulting experience. We supply surveillance systems and equipment to home owners, small, medium, and large sized businesses, as well as local and federal government agencies.
